question:
Which among the following about Henry Louis Vivian Derozio are correct?
1. He started the Young Bengal Movement
2. He was a professor of Hindu college
3. He was expelled from Hindu college in the year 1831
4. He founded the Academic Association
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: Henry Louis Vivian Derozio was born in the year 1809. He was a professor of Hindu college from 1827 to 1831. In the year 1831, he was expelled from Hindu college for his radicalism. He started the Young Bengal Movement. He founded the Academic Association in the year 1827.
